vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
σῑτομετρ-ία, ἡ,
measured allowance of corn, rations, [Refs 3rd c.BC+], Mélanges Glotz [Refs 2nd c.BC+]: so σῑτομέτρ-ιον, τό, [NT]; ἔπαρχος -μετρίου δήμου Ῥωμαίων, = Latin praefectus annonae, [Refs]; σῑτομέτρ-μετρον, τό, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: measured allowance of food, ration of grain
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
measured allowance of food, ration of grain
a certain measure of grain, distributed for food at set times to the slaves of a family, a ration, portion of food Lk. 12:42*
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: phần ăn; một phần đo (của ngũ cốc hoặc thực phẩm). σῖτος (G4621) và μέτρον (G3358)
